title: Should matchmaking have age brackets?
body: The answer is probably most definitely no, it would split the playerbase way too far. But at the same time, school holidays just started here in Australia and I am having a HORRIBLE time playing with all these perma-tilted kids!

replies.body: And the kids are having a horrible time playing with all these adults who have terrible reflexes. Fair's fair, I suppose. :P
